welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Martin Texmelucan de Labastida
welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Martin Texmelucan de Labastida! This charming city is known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and historical landmarks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that it has to offer.

restaurants.name: La Albertina
restaurants.description: La Albertina is a mexican restaurant located in San Martin Texmelucan.
restaurants.address: Libertad Norte (Entre Serdán y Edo. de Chiapas), 74000 San Martin Texmelucan, Puebla

restaurants.name: Nila
restaurants.description: Nila is a mexican restaurant located in San Martin Texmelucan.
restaurants.address: Carr. Federal México - Puebla (Prol Libertad Sur), 74000 San Martin Texmelucan, Puebla

restaurants.name: Tacos Melquiades
restaurants.description: Tacos Melquiades is a taco restaurant located in San Martin Texmelucan.
restaurants.address: Frente A Los Hombres Fuertes, San Martin Texmelucan, Puebla

restaurants.name: AlaBurger
restaurants.description: AlaBurger is a burger joint located in San Martin Texmelucan de Labas.
restaurants.address: San Martin Texmelucan de Labas, Puebla

restaurants.name: La Cabaña Del Conejo
restaurants.description: La Cabaña Del Conejo is a bbq joint located in San Martin Texmelucan.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hermanos Serdan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hermanos Serdan International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
